code: @Test public void testOnExceptionHandled() throws Exception {     Exchange reply = template.request("netty4-http:http://localhost:{{port}}/myserver?throwExceptionOnFailure=false", null).     assertNotNull(reply).     assertEquals("Dude something went wrong", reply.getOut().getBody(String.class)).     assertEquals(500, reply.getOut().getHeader(Exchange.HTTP_RESPONSE_CODE)). }
